title: Profile Settings
subtitle: Manage your account information and preferences

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Update your personal details and account information

account.title: Account Details
account.description: View your account status and metadata

security.title: Security
security.passwordDescription: Update your password regularly for better security
security.securityNoticeDescription: If you notice any unfamiliar devices or locations, revoke those sessions immediately and change your password.
security.revokeAllSessionsDescription: This will sign out all other devices from your account except the current one. All users will need to sign in again to access your account.
security.revokeWarning: This action cannot be undone. Make sure you recognize the current device before proceeding.
security.twoFactorEnabled: Two-factor authentication is enabled for your account
security.twoFactorDisabled: Add an extra layer of security to your account

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.subtitle: Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active sessions across different devices
sessions.alertDescription: View and manage all devices that are currently signed in to your account. The current session is highlighted and cannot be revoked.

dialogs.revokeSessionDescription: This will sign out this device. You'll need to sign in again on that device.
dialogs.revokeAllDescription: This will sign out all other devices. You'll stay signed in on this device.
dialogs.securityWarning: If you suspect unauthorized access, revoke all sessions and change your password immediately.

avatar.title: Update Profile Picture
avatar.description: Choose a new profile picture. The image will be resized to 128x128 pixels.
avatar.preview: Preview of your new profile picture
avatar.uploadInstructions: Click to upload or drag and drop

errors.invalidFileType: Please select a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP)
errors.dimensionsTooSmall: Image dimensions {{width}}x{{height}} are below minimum {{minWidth}}x{{minHeight}} pixels
